description: The TQS file is the main file type associated with Trivia Quiz Shell, which can be used to create and open the file. There are no other programs that can open the file. However, you can manually open the file as an .XML file to view its contents in XML format.

Trivia Quiz Shell is primarily used for academic purposes. Both teachers and students use the program to learn material and test what they have learned. It can be used to create custom tests and report scores.
